ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
Sand is hurled in the target’s face, reducing the
target’s accuracy.

emerald.flavor_text:
Reduces the foe’s accuracy
by hurling sand in its face.

effect_entries.effect: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lowers the target's accuracy by one stage.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
A move that leaves the target badly poisoned.
Its poison damage worsens every turn.

emerald.flavor_text:
Poisons the foe with an
intensifying toxin.

gold-silver.flavor_text:
A poison move with
increasing damage.

effect_entries.effect: Badly poisons the target.  Never misses when used by a poison-type Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
In this two-turn attack, blades of wind hit opposing
Pokémon on the second turn. Critical hits land
more easily.

emerald.flavor_text:
A 2-turn move that strikes
the foe on the 2nd turn.

effect_entries.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect_entries.short_effect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
A second-turn attack move where critical hits land
more easily. This may also make the target flinch.

emerald.flavor_text:
Searches out weak spots,
then strikes the next turn.

effect_entries.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.  Critical hit chance is one level higher than normal.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect_entries.short_effect: User charges for one turn before attacking.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage
from physical attacks for five turns.

emerald.flavor_text:
Creates a wall of light that
weakens physical attacks.

effect_entries.effect:
Erects a barrier around the user's side of the field that reduces damage from physical attacks by half for five turns.  In double battles, the reduction is 1/3.  Critical hits are not affected by the barrier.

If the user is holding light clay, the barrier lasts for eight turns.

brick break or defog used by an opponent will destroy the barrier.
effect_entries.short_effect: Reduces damage from physical attacks by half.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of
itself to raise its evasiveness.

emerald.flavor_text:
Creates illusory copies to
raise evasiveness.

effect_entries.effect: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises the user's evasion by one stage.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the
user quite a lot.

emerald.flavor_text:
A life-risking tackle that
also hurts the user.

gold-silver.flavor_text:
A tackle that also
hurts the user.

effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect_entries.short_effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user soars and then strikes its target on the
next turn.

emerald.flavor_text:
Flies up on the first turn,
then strikes the next turn.

effect_entries.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User flies high into the air for one turn, becoming immune to attack, and hits on the second turn.

During the immune turn, gust, hurricane, sky uppercut, smack down, thunder, twister, and whirlwind still hit the user normally.  gust and twister also have double power against the user.

The damage from hail and sandstorm still applies during the immune turn.

The user may be hit during its immune turn if under the effect of lock on, mind reader, or no guard.

This move cannot be used while gravity is in effect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect_entries.short_effect: User flies high into the air, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes
back to cause double the damage taken.

emerald.flavor_text:
Endures attack for 2
turns to retaliate double.

effect_entries.effect:
User waits for two turns.  On the second turn, the user inflicts twice the damage it accumulated on the last Pokémon to hit it.  Damage inflicted is typeless.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect_entries.short_effect: User waits for two turns, then hits back for twice the damage it took.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
A physical attack in which the user charges and
slams into the target with its whole body.

emerald.flavor_text:
Charges the foe with a full-
body tackle.

effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched
at the target to inflict damage.

emerald.flavor_text:
Strikes the foe with a gust
of wind whipped up by wings.

gold-silver.flavor_text:
Whips up a strong
gust of wind.

effect_entries.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.

If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect_entries.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
As long as this move is in use, the power of rage
raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit
in battle.

emerald.flavor_text:
Raises the user’s ATTACK
every time it is hit.

gold-silver.flavor_text:
Raises ATTACK if
the user is hit.

effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Every time the user is hit after it uses this move but before its next action, its Attack raises by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user copies the target’s last move. The move
can be used during battle until the Pokémon is
switched out.

emerald.flavor_text:
Copies a move used by the
foe during one battle.

gold-silver.flavor_text:
Copies a move used
by the foe.

effect_entries.effect:
This move is replaced by the target's last successfully used move, and its PP changes to 5.  If the target hasn't used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if the user already knows the targeted move, this move will fail.  This effect vanishes when the user leaves the field.

If chatter, metronome, mimic, sketch, or struggle is selected, this move will fail.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome, nor forced by encore.
effect_entries.short_effect: Copies the target's last used move.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into
the target. This also damages the user a little.

emerald.flavor_text:
A reckless charge attack
that also hurts the user.

gold-silver.flavor_text:
A tackle that also
hurts the user.

effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect_entries.short_effect: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is
dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a
single Pokémon.

emerald.flavor_text:
Blows away the foe with
wind and ends the battle.

gold-silver.flavor_text:
Blows away the foe
& ends battle.

effect_entries.effect:
Switches the target out for another of its trainer's Pokémon selected at random.  Wild battles end immediately.

Doesn't affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
effect_entries.short_effect: Immediately ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The target is struck with large, imposing wings
spread wide to inflict damage.

emerald.flavor_text:
Strikes the foe with wings
spread wide.

effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully
restores the user’s HP and heals any
status conditions.

emerald.flavor_text:
The user sleeps for 2 turns,
restoring HP and status.

gold-silver.flavor_text:
Sleep for 2 turns
to fully recover.

effect_entries.effect:
User falls to sleep and immediately regains all its HP.  If the user has another major status effect, sleep will replace it.  The user will always wake up after two turns, or one turn with early bird.

This move fails if the Pokémon cannot fall asleep due to uproar, insomnia, or vital spirit.  It also fails if the Pokémon is at full health or is already asleep.
effect_entries.short_effect: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes
it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

emerald.flavor_text:
An extremely fast attack
that always strikes first.

gold-silver.flavor_text:
Lets the user get
in the first hit.

effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal-
and Fighting-type attacks. This also enables an
evasive target to be hit.

emerald.flavor_text:
Negates the foe’s efforts
to heighten evasiveness.

effect_entries.effect: Resets the target's evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field.  A ghost under this effect takes normal damage from normal and fighting moves.  This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
effect_entries.short_effect: Forces the target to have no Evade, and allows it to be hit by Normal and Fighting moves even if it's a Ghost.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user relaxes and lightens its body to move
faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.

emerald.flavor_text:
Relaxes the body to sharply
boost SPEED.

effect_entries.effect: Raises the user's Speed by two stages.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises the user's Speed by two stages.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
This full-power attack grows more powerful the
more the user likes its Trainer.

emerald.flavor_text:
An attack that increases
in power with friendship.

gold-silver.flavor_text:
An attack that is
based on loyalty.

effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases with happiness, given by `happiness * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102.  Power bottoms out at 1.
effect_entries.short_effect: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user counters the target by mimicking the
target’s last move.

emerald.flavor_text:
Counters the foe’s attack
with the same move.

effect_entries.effect:
Uses the last move targeted at the user by a Pokémon still on the field.  A move counts as targeting the user even if it hit multiple Pokémon, as long as the user was one of them; however, moves targeting the field itself do not count.  If the user has not been targeted by an appropriate move since entering the field, or if no Pokémon that targeted the user remains on the field, this move will fail.

Moves that failed, missed, had no effect, or were blocked are still copied.

Assist moves, time-delayed moves, “meta” moves that operate on other moves/Pokémon/abilities, and some other special moves cannot be copied and are ignored; if the last move to hit the user was such a move, the previous move will be used instead.  The full list of ignored moves is: acid armor, acupressure, after you, agility, ally switch, amnesia, aqua ring, aromatherapy, aromatic mist, assist, autotomize, barrier, baton pass, belch, belly drum, bide, bulk up, calm mind, camouflage, celebrate, charge, coil, conversion, conversion 2, copycat, cosmic power, cotton guard, counter, crafty shield, curse, defend order, defense curl, destiny bond, detect, doom desire, double team, dragon dance, electric terrain, endure, final gambit, flower shield, focus energy, focus punch, follow me, future sight, geomancy, grassy terrain, gravity, growth, grudge, guard split, hail, happy hour, harden, haze, heal bell, heal order, heal pulse, healing wish, helping hand, hold hands, hone claws, howl, imprison, ingrain, ion deluge, iron defense, kings shield, light screen, lucky chant, lunar dance, magic coat, magnet rise, magnetic flux, mat block, me first, meditate, metronome, milk drink, mimic, minimize, mirror coat, mirror move, mist, misty terrain, moonlight, morning sun, mud sport, nasty plot, nature power, perish song, power split, power trick, protect, psych up, quick guard, quiver dance, rage powder, rain dance, recover, recycle, reflect, reflect type, refresh, rest, rock polish, role play, roost, rototiller, safeguard, sandstorm, shadow blast, shadow bolt, shadow half, shadow rush, shadow shed, shadow sky, shadow storm, shadow wave, sharpen, shell smash, shift gear, sketch, slack off, sleep talk, snatch, soft boiled, spikes, spiky shield, spit up, splash, stealth rock, sticky web, stockpile, struggle, substitute, sunny day, swallow, swords dance, synthesis, tail glow, tailwind, teleport, toxic spikes, transform, water sport, wide guard, wish, withdraw and work up.

This move cannot be selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk, nor forced by encore.
effect_entries.short_effect: Uses the target's last used move.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user hurls mud in the target’s face to inflict
damage and lower its accuracy.

emerald.flavor_text:
Hurls mud in the foe’s face
to reduce its accuracy.

effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP.
The copy serves as the user’s decoy.

emerald.flavor_text:
Creates a decoy using 1/4
of the user’s maximum HP.

gold-silver.flavor_text:
Makes a decoy with
1/4 user's max HP.

effect_entries.effect:
Transfers 1/4 the user's max HP into a doll that absorbs damage and causes most negative move effects to fail.  If the user leaves the field, the doll will vanish.  If the user cannot pay the HP cost, this move will fail.

The doll takes damage as normal, using the user's stats and types, and will break when its HP reaches zero.  Self-inflicted damage from confusion or recoil is not absorbed.  Healing effects from opponents ignore the doll and heal the user as normal.  Moves that work based on the user's HP still do so; the doll's HP does not influence any move.

The doll will block major status effects, confusion, and flinching.  The effects of smelling salts and wake up slap do not trigger against a doll, even if the Pokémon behind the doll has the appropriate major status effect.  Multi-turn trapping moves like wrap will hit the doll for their regular damage, but the multi-turn trapping and damage effects will not activate.

Moves blocked or damage absorbed by the doll do not count as hitting the user or inflicting damage for any effects that respond to such, e.g., avalanche, counter, or a rowap berry.  magic coat still works as normal, even against moves the doll would block.  Opposing Pokémon that damage the doll with a leech move like absorb are healed as normal.

It will also block acupressure, block, the curse effect of curse, dream eater, embargo, flatter, gastro acid, grudge, heal block, leech seed, lock on, mean look, mimic, mind reader, nightmare, pain split, psycho shift, spider web, sketch, swagger, switcheroo, trick, worry seed, and yawn.  A Pokémon affected by yawn before summoning the doll will still fall to sleep.

The doll blocks intimidate, but all other abilities act as though the doll did not exist.  If the user has an ability that absorbs moves of a certain type for HP (such as volt absorb absorbing thunder wave), such moves will not be blocked.

life orb and berries that cause confusion still work as normal, but their respective HP loss and confusion are absorbed/blocked by the doll.

The user is still vulnerable to damage inflicted when entering or leaving the field, such as by pursuit or spikes; however, the doll will block the poison effect of toxic spikes.

The doll is passed on by baton pass.  It keeps its existing HP, but uses the replacement Pokémon's stats and types for damage calculation.

All other effects work as normal.
effect_entries.short_effect: Transfers 1/4 of the user's max HP into a doll, protecting the user from further damage or status changes until it breaks.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
This full-power attack grows more powerful the
less the user likes its Trainer.

emerald.flavor_text:
An attack that is stronger
if the TRAINER is disliked.

gold-silver.flavor_text:
An attack based on
lack of loyalty.

effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases inversely with happiness, given by `(255 - happiness) * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102.  Power bottoms out at 1.
effect_entries.short_effect: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
A unique attack that varies in type depending on the
Pokémon using it.

emerald.flavor_text:
The effectiveness varies
with the user.

gold-silver.flavor_text:
The power varies
with the POKéMON.

effect_entries.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power and type are determined by the user's IVs.

Power is given by `x * 40 / 63 + 30`.  `x` is obtained by arranging bit 1 from the IV for each of Special Defense, Special Attack, Speed, Defense, Attack, and HP in that order.  (Bit 1 is 1 if the IV is of the form `4n + 2` or `4n + 3`.  `x` is then 64 * Special Defense IV bit 1, plus 32 * Special Attack IV bit 1, etc.)

Power is always between 30 and 70, inclusive.  Average power is 49.5.

Type is given by `y * 15 / 63`, where `y` is similar to `x` above, except constructed from bit 0.  (Bit 0 is 1 if the IV is odd.)  The result is looked up in the following table.

Value | Type
----: | --------
    0 | fighting
    1 | flying
    2 | poison
    3 | ground
    4 | rock
    5 | bug
    6 | ghost
    7 | steel
    8 | fire
    9 | water
   10 | grass
   11 | electric
   12 | psychic
   13 | ice
   14 | dragon
   15 | dark

This move thus cannot be normal.  Most other types have an equal 1/16 chance to be selected, given random IVs.  However, due to the flooring used here, bug, fighting, and grass appear 5/64 of the time, and dark only 1/64 of the time.
effect_entries.short_effect: Power and type depend upon user's IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also
raise the user’s Defense stat.

emerald.flavor_text:
Strikes the foe with hard
wings spread wide.

effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Defense one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise the user's Defense by one stage.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
This attack can be used only if the user is asleep.
The harsh noise may also make the target flinch.

emerald.flavor_text:
A loud attack that can be
used only while asleep.

gold-silver.flavor_text:
An attack useable
only while asleep.

effect_entries.effect: Only usable if the user is sleeping.  Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user attacks and steals the target’s held item
simultaneously. The user can’t steal anything if it
already holds an item.

emerald.flavor_text:
While attacking, it may
steal the foe’s held item.

gold-silver.flavor_text:
An attack that may
steal a held item.

effect_entries.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding an item and the user is not, the user will permanently take the item.  Damage is still inflicted if an item cannot be taken.

Pokémon with sticky hold or multitype are immune to the item theft effect.

The target cannot recover its item with recycle.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
effect_entries.short_effect: Takes the target's item.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target
becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

emerald.flavor_text:
Makes the opposite gender
less likely to attack.

effect_entries.effect: Causes the target to fall in love with the user, giving it a 50% chance to do nothing each turn.  If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.  If either Pokémon leaves the field, this effect ends.
effect_entries.short_effect: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering
up Fire-type moves. It lowers the power of
Water-type moves.

emerald.flavor_text:
Boosts the power of FIRE-
type moves for 5 turns.

effect_entries.effect:
Changes the weather to sunshine for five turns, during which fire moves inflict 50% extra damage, and water moves inflict half damage.

If the user is holding heat rock, this effect lasts for eight turns.

Pokémon cannot become frozen.

thunder has 50% accuracy.

solar beam skips its charge turn.

moonlight, morning sun, and synthesis heal 2/3 of the user's max HP.

Pokémon with chlorophyll have doubled original Speed.

Pokémon with forecast become fire.

Pokémon with leaf guard are not affected by major status effects.

Pokémon with flower gift change form; every Pokémon on their side of the field have their original Attack and Special Attack increased by 50%.

Pokémon with dry skin lose 1/8 max HP at the end of each turn.

Pokémon with solar power have their original Special Attack raised by 50% but lose 1/8 their max HP at the end of each turn.
effect_entries.short_effect: Changes the weather to sunny for five turns.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The power of this attack move is doubled if it’s used
on a target that’s switching out of battle.

emerald.flavor_text:
Inflicts bad damage if used
on a foe switching out.

effect_entries.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target attempts to switch out this turn before the user acts, this move hits the target before it leaves and has double power.

This effect can still hit a Pokémon that switches out when it has a substitute up or when an ally has used follow me.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has double power against, and can hit, Pokémon attempting to switch out.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups
the Speed stat of the user and its allies for
four turns.

effect_entries.effect: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user's side of the field have their original Speed doubled.  This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
effect_entries.short_effect: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the
opposing Pokémon. This may also make them flinch.

emerald.flavor_text:
Whips up a vicious twister
to tear at the foe.

gold-silver.flavor_text:
Whips up a tornado
to attack.

effect_entries.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make each target flinch.

If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of
failing rises if it is used in succession.

emerald.flavor_text:
Evades attack, but may fail
if used in succession.

gold-silver.flavor_text:
Evades attack that
turn. It may fail.

effect_entries.effect:
No moves will hit the user for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail.

lock on, mind reader, and no guard provide a (100 – accuracy)% chance for moves to break through this move.  This does not apply to one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold); those are always blocked by this move.

thunder during rain dance and blizzard during hail have a 30% chance to break through this move.

The following effects are not prevented by this move:

* acupressure from an ally
* curse's curse effect
* Delayed damage from doom desire and future sight; however, these moves will be prevented if they are used this turn
* feint, which will also end this move's protection after it hits
* imprison
* perish song
* shadow force
* Moves that merely copy the user, such as transform or psych up

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
effect_entries.short_effect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user approaches the target disarmingly, then
throws a sucker punch. This attack never misses.

emerald.flavor_text:
Draws the foe close, then
strikes without fail.

effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
effect_entries.short_effect: Never misses.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the
moves it knows.

emerald.flavor_text:
Uses an available move
randomly while asleep.

effect_entries.effect:
Only usable if the user is sleeping.  Randomly selects and uses one of the user's other three moves.  Use of the selected move requires and costs 0 PP.

This move will not select assist, bide, bounce, chatter, copycat, dig, dive, fly, focus punch, me first, metronome, mirror move, shadow force, skull bash, sky attack, sky drop, sleep talk, solar beam, razor wind, or uproar.

If the selected move requires a recharge turn—i.e., one of blast burn, frenzy plant, giga impact, hydro cannon, hyper beam, roar of time, or rock wrecker—and the user is still sleeping next turn, then it's forced to use this move again and pay another PP for the recharge turn.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
effect_entries.short_effect: Randomly uses one of the user's other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user lands and rests its body. It restores the
user’s HP by up to half of its max HP.

effect_entries.effect: Heals the user for half its max HP.  If the user is flying, its flying type is ignored until the end of this turn.
effect_entries.short_effect: Heals the user by half its max HP.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
After making its attack, the user rushes back to
switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

effect_entries.effect:
Inflicts regular damage, then the user immediately switches out, and the trainer selects a replacement Pokémon from the party.  If the target faints from this attack, the user's trainer selects the new Pokémon to send out first.  If the user is the last Pokémon in its party that can battle, it will not switch out.

The user may be hit by pursuit when it switches out, if it has been targeted and pursuit has not yet been used.

This move may be used even if the user is under the effect of ingrain.  ingrain's effect will end.
effect_entries.short_effect: User must switch out after attacking.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user launches razor-like wind to slash the
opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.

emerald.flavor_text:
Hacks with razorlike wind.
High critical-hit ratio.

effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP.
Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

emerald.flavor_text:
Endures any attack for
1 turn, leaving at least 1HP.

effect_entries.effect:
The user's HP cannot be lowered below 1 by any means for the remainder of this turn.

If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
effect_entries.short_effect: Prevents the user's HP from lowering below 1 this turn.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user attacks the target with a song. Others can
join in the Round to increase the power of
the attack.

effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If round has already been used this turn, this move's power is doubled.  After this move is used, any other Pokémon using it this turn will immediately do so (in the order they would otherwise act), regardless of Speed or priority.  Pokémon using other moves will then continue to act as usual.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has double power if it's used more than once per turn.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of
failing rises if it is used in succession.

emerald.flavor_text:
Evades attack, but may fail
if used in succession.

gold-silver.flavor_text:
Foils attack that
turn. It may fail.

effect_entries.effect:
No moves will hit the user for the remainder of this turn.  If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail.

If the user successfully used detect, endure, protect, quick guard, or wide guard on the last turn, this move has a 50% chance to fail.

lock on, mind reader, and no guard provide a (100 – accuracy)% chance for moves to break through this move.  This does not apply to one-hit KO moves (fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold); those are always blocked by this move.

thunder during rain dance and blizzard during hail have a 30% chance to break through this move.

The following effects are not prevented by this move:

* acupressure from an ally
* curse's curse effect
* Delayed damage from doom desire and future sight; however, these moves will be prevented if they are used this turn
* feint, which will also end this move's protection after it hits
* imprison
* perish song
* shadow force
* Moves that merely copy the user, such as transform or psych up

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
effect_entries.short_effect: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user enrages and confuses the target. However,
this also sharply raises the target’s Attack stat.

emerald.flavor_text:
Confuses the foe, but also
sharply raises ATTACK.

effect_entries.effect: Raises the target's Attack by two stages, then confuses it.  If the target's Attack cannot be raised by two stages, the confusion is not applied.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises the target's Attack by two stages and confuses the target.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
This attack move doubles its power if the user is
poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.

emerald.flavor_text:
Boosts ATTACK when burned,
paralyzed, or poisoned.

effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned, this move has double power.
effect_entries.short_effect: Power doubles if user is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user covers the target’s body with a mass of
down that harshly lowers its Attack stat.

emerald.flavor_text:
Envelops the foe with down
to sharply reduce ATTACK.

effect_entries.effect: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lowers the target's Attack by two stages.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
A move that works differently for the Ghost type
than for all other types.

emerald.flavor_text:
A move that functions
differently for GHOSTS.

effect_entries.effect:
If the user is a ghost: user pays half its max HP to place a curse on the target, damaging it for 1/4 its max HP every turn.
Otherwise: Lowers the user's Speed by one stage, and raises its Attack and Defense by one stage each.

The curse effect is passed on by baton pass.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move.
effect_entries.short_effect: Ghosts pay half their max HP to hurt the target every turn.  Others decrease Speed but raise Attack and Defense.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk
stats increase.

effect_entries.effect: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive
wind. This may also raise all the user’s stats at once.

effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise all of the user's stats one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to raise all of the user's stats by one stage.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user attacks in an uproar for three turns.
During that time, no Pokémon can fall asleep.

emerald.flavor_text:
Causes an uproar for 2 to 5
turns and prevents sleep.

effect_entries.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  User is forced to use this move for 2–5 turns, selected at random.  All Pokémon on the field wake up, and none can fall to sleep until the lock-in ends.

Pokémon cannot use rest during this effect.

This move cannot be selected by sleep talk.
effect_entries.short_effect: Forced to use this move for several turns.  Pokémon cannot fall asleep in that time.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five
turns, powering up Water-type moves. It lowers
the power of Fire-type moves.

emerald.flavor_text:
Boosts the power of WATER-
type moves for 5 turns.

effect_entries.effect:
Changes the weather to rain for five turns, during which water moves inflict 50% extra damage, and fire moves inflict half damage.

If the user is holding damp rock, this effect lasts for eight turns.

thunder has 100% accuracy.  If the target has used detect or protect, thunder has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection.

solar beam has half power.

moonlight, morning sun, and synthesis heal only 1/4 of the user's max HP.

Pokémon with swift swim have doubled original Speed.

Pokémon with forecast become water.

Pokémon with dry skin heal 1/8 max HP, Pokémon with hydration are cured of major status effects, and Pokémon with rain dish heal 1/16 max HP at the end of each turn.
effect_entries.short_effect: Changes the weather to rain for five turns.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
If any opposing Pokémon is the opposite gender of
the user, it is charmed, which harshly lowers its
Sp. Atk stat.

effect_entries.effect: Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages.  If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages if it's the opposite gender.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The additional effects of this attack depend upon
where it was used.

emerald.flavor_text:
An attack with effects
that vary by location.

effect_entries.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to inflict an effect chosen according to the terrain.

Terrain        | Effect
-------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------
Building       | Paralyzes target
Cave           | Makes target flinch
Deep water     | Lowers target's Attack by one stage
Desert         | Lowers target's accuracy by one stage
Grass          | Puts target to sleep
Mountain       | Makes target flinch
Road           | Lowers target's accuracy by one stage
Shallow water  | Lowers target's Attack by one stage
Snow           | Freezes target
Tall grass     | Puts target to sleep

In Pokémon Battle Revolution:

Terrain        | Effect
-------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------
Courtyard      | Paralyzes target
Crystal        | Makes target flinch
Gateway        | Lowers target's Attack by one stage
Magma          | Makes target flinch
Main Street    | Paralyzes target
Neon           | Paralyzes target
Stargazer      | Makes target flinch
Sunny Park     | Puts target to sleep
Sunset         | Lowers target's accuracy by one stage
Waterfall      | Puts target to sleep
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to inflict a status effect which depends upon the terrain.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a
Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

effect_entries.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding a berry, this move has double power, and the user takes the berry and uses it immediately.

If the target is holding a jaboca berry or rowap berry, the berry is still removed, but has no effect.

If this move is super effective and the target is holding a berry that can reduce this move's damage, it will do so, and will not be stolen.
effect_entries.short_effect: If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user confounds the target with speed, then
slashes. This attack never misses.

emerald.flavor_text:
An extremely speedy and
unavoidable attack.

effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
effect_entries.short_effect: Never misses.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the
opposing Pokémon. This may also leave those
Pokémon with a burn.

emerald.flavor_text:
Exhales a hot breath on the
foe. May inflict a burn.

effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low
altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.

effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect_entries.short_effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

ultra-sun-ultra-moon.flavor_text:
The user tells the target a secret, and the target
loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers
the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

effect_entries.effect: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lowers the target's Special Attack by one stage.
